description: Dramatic floor-length black leather coat with structured shoulders

core:description.text: A commanding floor-length coat crafted from supple black leather that flows dramatically from structured shoulders to the ground. The high collar frames the face while wide shoulder pieces add height and presence, creating an imposing silhouette. The leather's smooth finish catches light as the coat moves, emphasizing its sweeping lines and gothic elegance. This statement piece transforms any outfit into a dramatic ensemble, perfect for making an unforgettable entrance.
